title: Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help
OB: When the change editor menu is open and F1 is pressed, the help window opens but immediately closes before the contents can be read.
EB: If F1 is defined for the change editor menu, the help window should stay open for the user to read.
SR:
1. Open the change editor menu.
2. Press F1.
3. Observe that the help window opens and then immediately closes before the contents can be read.
